query:
-- Buscar TODOS os pedidos do produto, independente do status
SELECT 
  po.id as pedidoId,
  po.customerOrderNumber,
  po.status as statusPedido,
  po.shippingStatus,
  poi.requestedQuantity,
  poi.unit,
  p.sku,
  p.description,
  p.unitsPerBox,
  CASE 
    WHEN poi.unit = 'box' THEN poi.requestedQuantity * p.unitsPerBox
    ELSE poi.requestedQuantity
  END as totalUnidades,
  po.createdAt,
  po.updatedAt
FROM pickingOrders po
INNER JOIN pickingOrderItems poi ON po.id = poi.pickingOrderId
INNER JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
WHERE poi.productId = (
    SELECT i.productId 
    FROM inventory i 
    INNER JOIN warehouseLocations wl ON i.locationId = wl.id 
    WHERE wl.code = 'H01-01-01' 
    AND i.reservedQuantity > 0
    LIMIT 1
  )
  AND poi.batch = (
    SELECT i.batch 
    FROM inventory i 
    INNER JOIN warehouseLocations wl ON i.locationId = wl.id 
    WHERE wl.code = 'H01-01-01' 
    AND i.reservedQuantity > 0
    LIMIT 1
  )
ORDER BY po.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10;

  po.customerOrderNumber,
  po.status as statusPedido,
  po.shippingStatus,
  poi.requestedQuantity,
  poi.unit,
  p.sku,
  p.description,
  p.unitsPerBox,
  CASE 
    WHEN poi.unit = 'box' THEN poi.requestedQuantity * p.unitsPerBox
    ELSE poi.requestedQuantity
  END as totalUnidades,
  po.createdAt,
  po.updatedAt
FROM pickingOrders po
INNER JOIN pickingOrderItems poi ON po.id = poi.pickingOrderId
INNER JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
WHERE poi.productId = (
    SELECT i.productId 
    FROM inventory i 
    INNER JOIN warehouseLocations wl ON i.locationId = wl.id 
    WHERE wl.code = 'H01-01-01' 
    AND i.reservedQuantity > 0
    LIMIT 1
  )
  AND poi.batch = (
    SELECT i.batch 
    FROM inventory i 
    INNER JOIN warehouseLocations wl ON i.locationId = wl.id 
    WHERE wl.code = 'H01-01-01' 
    AND i.reservedQuantity > 0
    LIMIT 1
  )
ORDER BY po.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10;
